ISSUE.TITLE: When creating a subscription the customer should be taken from URL
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: Subscriptions have endpoint in the form: `customers/:id/subscriptions`. So, when creating a subscription, the customer must match the one in the URL and it shouldn't be settable through POST data.
